game.title: The Quest for the Ancient Artifact
game.objective: Uncover the artifact's location and protect it from falling into evil hands
game.description: This quest demands you to track down the map, confront the thieves, and ultimately retrieve the artifact. Your success will save our land from a grave threat.
game.reward: 500 gold coins, a mystic amulet, and the respect of your people

task.objective: Track down the thieves at The Bandit's Den
task.description: Deliver a message to them, convincing them to hand over the map. Beware - they may not go easily.
